sections.heading: Agreements or contracts to gather and preserve
sections.text:
(a) The Adjutant General of this State shall make such agreements or contracts as are appropriate to preserve all war records, colors, standards, and battle flags as are or shall become the property of the State.(b) The Adjutant General shall make such
